Data Fields
_NV_GSYNC_CONTROL_PARAMS Struct Reference

#include <nvapi.h>

Data Fields

NvU32 version
NVAPI_GSYNC_POLARITY polarity
NVAPI_GSYNC_VIDEO_MODE vmode
NvU32 interval
NVAPI_GSYNC_SYNC_SOURCE source
NvU32 interlaceMode:1
NvU32 reserved:31
NV_GSYNC_DELAY syncSkew
NV_GSYNC_DELAY startupDelay

Detailed Description

Used in NvAPI_GSync_GetControlParameters() and NvAPI_GSync_SetControlParameters().

Field Documentation

NvU32 _NV_GSYNC_CONTROL_PARAMS::interlaceMode

interlace mode for a Sync device

NvU32 _NV_GSYNC_CONTROL_PARAMS::interval

Number of pulses to wait between framelock signal generation.

NVAPI_GSYNC_POLARITY _NV_GSYNC_CONTROL_PARAMS::polarity

Leading edge / Falling edge / both.

NvU32 _NV_GSYNC_CONTROL_PARAMS::reserved

should be set zero

NVAPI_GSYNC_SYNC_SOURCE _NV_GSYNC_CONTROL_PARAMS::source

VSync/House sync.

NV_GSYNC_DELAY _NV_GSYNC_CONTROL_PARAMS::startupDelay

Sync start delay for master.

NV_GSYNC_DELAY _NV_GSYNC_CONTROL_PARAMS::syncSkew

The time delay between the frame sync signal and the GPUs signal.

NvU32 _NV_GSYNC_CONTROL_PARAMS::version

Version of the structure.

NVAPI_GSYNC_VIDEO_MODE _NV_GSYNC_CONTROL_PARAMS::vmode

None, TTL, NTSCPALSECAM, HDTV.
